effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 717,903 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 289,058.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,457 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 196 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You are one of the devout. Your spells and abilities have a chance of burning a nearby enemy for 307,468 Radiant damage and healing another devout ally for that amount.
